long_description: Add comfort and sophistication to your campsite with the GSI Outdoors Macro table. It gives you a stable surface where you can cook, eat or play games. Strong slats of lightweight aluminum form the table surface; dual-height, folding legs hold the table 14.75 in. off the ground. Accordion-fold design of the GSI Outdoors Macro table compacts to fit in the included 24 x 4.75 x 2.4 in. stuff sack. Please note: dishware in picture is not included.
short_description: Add comfort and sophistication to your campsite with the GSI Outdoors Macro table. It gives you a stable surface where you can cook, eat or play games.
